response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe is worth more than $1,200,000 to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true value, making it a truly remarkable investment for someone like yourself who appreciates high-quality products. I am confident that you will find immense value in this offering, and I look forward to discussing the details further with you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
